arts.ttl: Barcelona face double suspension scare ahead of Champions League tie vs Club Brugge
arts.sum: As Barcelona prepare to take on Club Brugge in the UEFA Champions League, Hansi Flick faces a delicate balancing act in midfield. The Catalans, who are already dealing with the absence of Pedri, now have to manage two key players who are one booking away from suspension, namely, Frenkie de Jong and Marc Casado. Both […] The post Barcelona face double suspension scare ahead of Champions League tie vs Club Brugge appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: The 5 Barcelona players set to miss Club Brugge clash
arts.sum: A quintet of first-team players at La Liga giants Barcelona are set to sit out the club’s upcoming meeting with Club Brugge. This comes owing to respective injury problems. As…
